models.name: LuBeneficialUse
models.description: This table is based on the [use] column in the [vw_CDSS_NetAmts] view, but the definitions have been recreated so that the user can see the full definition.

models.name: LuFreshSalineIndicator
models.description: This table is based on the reported water quality of the resource in question. The default for Colorado is fresh/potable water.

models.name: LuLegalStatus
models.description: This table is based on the [vw_CDSS_NetAmts] view.

models.name: LuSourceType
models.description: This table contains the source type characteristics listed in the HydroBase Data Dictionary Appendix. These values are currently not used in the HydroBase WaDE data.
